remarks: A (left) ideal of a domain which is neither the zero ideal nor the unit ideal is not a unital ring.  (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2020.)
statement:
lidlabl.l $e |- L = ( LIdeal ` R ) $.
lidlabl.i $e |- I = ( R |`s U ) $.
zlidlring.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
zlidlring.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
lidldomnnring $p |- ( ( R e. Domn /\ ( U e. L /\ U =/= { .0. } /\ U =/= B ) ) -> I e/ Ring ) $.
